hypothesis_content.title: Neutral-to-Bear Momentum Divergence
hypothesis_content.statement: When market transitions from NEUTRAL to BEAR regime while BTC maintains price above 50-day SMA but ETH/BTC ratio declines >5% in 3 days, shorting ETH/BTC ratio will generate alpha over the next 8 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: During risk-off transitions (NEUTRAL→BEAR), capital flows from altcoins to BTC as a relative safe haven. ETH/BTC weakness preceding regime confirmation suggests early rotation that accelerates during the bear transition. Divergence between positive ETH funding and negative BTC funding indicates overcrowded ETH longs.
entry_conditions: Regime transitions from NEUTRAL to BEAR (confidence > 68%)
ETH/BTC ratio has declined >5% over past 3 trading days
BTC dominance increases >2% during the same period
ETH funding rates remain positive while BTC funding turns negative

exit_conditions.take_profit: ETH/BTC ratio declines additional 4% or regime returns to NEUTRAL

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: ETH/BTC ratio strengthens during bear regime in >40% of cases, or BTC fails to maintain relative strength (drops below 50-day SMA within 3 days).
